mapper.select: SELECT usm.user_shop_id, usm.create_time, usm.point, buyer.user_id, buyer.name, s.shop_id, s.shop_name FROM tb_user_shop_map usm, tb_person_inf buyer, tb_shop s WHERE usm.user_id = buyer.user_id and usm.shop_id = s.shop_id and usm.user_id = #{userId} and usm.shop_id = #{shopId}
